MemoryInfobox.description: 'Lysander's ruthless disregard for enemies was more than tactics. It was a restless beast within him. The General only needed to hitch the demons to his chariot.'

General_Description: '''The Cost of War''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After collecting three ''[[polemarch]]'' seals, Kassandra returned to [[Lysander]] in [[Sparta]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra: '''''I'll kill the fort commanders if it's what must be done.''
Lysander growls disappointingly.
*'''Lysander: '''''We've lost ground.''
*'''Kassandra: '''''You'll gain it back.''
*'''Lysander: '''''I'm the only one of our generals who can. The wealthy don't understand the ugly things desperation makes people do.''
*'''Kassandra: '''''I'll take care of the fort commanders. That should help you regain a foothold.''
*'''Lysander: '''''Go! Don't return until they've been disposed of.''
*'''Kassandra: '''''Understood.''
Kassandra approached Lysander.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have more of the enemy seals.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Good enough.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Better than that.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''None of our own generals could win this without me.''
(Dialogue continues to start the next quest.)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Lysander eliminate three Athenian ''polemarchs'' and recover their seals. She was again tasked to retrieve more.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
